title: SQL ServerCURRENT_TIMESTAMPFunction

metadata.description: Learn about SQL ServerCURRENT_TIMESTAMPFunction with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
❯
Example
Return the current date and time:
SELECT 
  CURRENT_TIMESTAMP;

Definition and Usage
The CURRENT_TIMESTAMP function returns the current date and time, in a 
'YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm:ss.mmm' format.
Tip:
Also look at the
GETDATE()
function.
Syntax
CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
Technical Details
Works in:
SQL Server (starting with 2008), Azure SQL Database, Azure SQL Data 
  Warehouse, Parallel Data Warehouse

❯
★
+1
